devdoc.author: @neuro_0x
devdoc.details: A factory library to deploy instances of the CoinGenieERC20 contract.

launchToken(string,string,uint256,addres.details: Creates a new instance of the CoinGenieERC20 contract

params.affiliateFeeRecipient: - the address to receive the affiliate fee
params.autoWithdrawThreshold: - the threshold at which the contract will automatically withdraw the tax fees
params.burnPercentage: - the percent in basis points to burn on every tx if this token is deflationary
params.customConfigProps: - a struct of configuration booleans for the token
params.feePercentage: - the percent in basis points to use as a tax
params.feeRecipient: - the address to receive the tax fees
params.initialSupply: - the initial supply of the token
params.maxPerWallet: - the maximum amount of tokens allowed to be held by one wallet
params.maxTaxSwap: - the maximum amount of tokens allowed to be swapped at once by manual or autoswap
params.name: - the name of the token
params.symbol: - the ticker symbol of the token
params.tokenOwner: - the address that will be the owner of the token
params.treasuryRecipient: - the address to receive the royalty fee

returns.newToken: - the CoinGenieERC20 token that was created

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDiscountFeeRequiredAmount(uint256).details: Allows the owner to set the amount of $GENIE a person has to hold to get the discount if it has not been set

params.amount: - the amount of $GENIE a person has to hold to get the discount

setGenie(address).details: Sets the address of the genie token

params.genie: - the address of the genie token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_discountFeeRequiredAmount.details: The amount of $GENIE a person has to hold to get the discount

_genie.details: The address of the genie token

devdoc.title: ERC20Factory

GenieAlreadySet().notice: Error thrown when the genie is already set.
